column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////While I don't dine at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba more than a few times a year
column2: it certainly gets 5 stars from me. The restaurant is very loud with high energy
column3: so keep that in mind! Their sangria is a must
column4: and I recommend a pitcher if you're with more than 2 people. It's ALWAYS busy
column5: so you should make a reservation.
